item.title: A Greek Summer
item.description: It got a little chilly here in Uppsala today, so I thought it would be a good idea to share the photos of my little summer project. View the photos here or click this link to view them on the project's page (they're much bigger over there!).

item.title: What's on your head
item.description: A week ago I attended a street photography workshop with Eric Kim at Fotografiska in Stockholm. Lots of inspiration and nice people. I didn't make the best images but I went way out of my comfort zone which is always good! Here are the photos of the project I had.

item.title: Kalamaria
item.description: Some photos from the streets of Kalamaria in Thessaloniki, Greece.
